No Principles: The Protocols of the Elders of Zion is a fraudulent antisemitic text purporting to describe a Jewish plan for global domination. The text was first published in Russia in 1903, and is widely considered to be a work of fiction created by the Tsarist secret police. Despite being debunked and discredited numerous times, the Protocols have been translated into many languages and continue to be circulated and believed by some antisemitic individuals and groups. The document is a classic example of a conspiracy theory and has been used to justify discrimination, persecution, and violence against Jews throughout history. It is important to note that the Protocols of the Elders of Zion is a hateful and baseless fabrication, and has no basis in reality.
